subject: Olympic Games
Wrestling
lead_paragraph: Rulon Gardner’s effort to win a third Olympic medal in Greco-Roman wrestling at age 40 ended when he did not appear for a weigh-in at the Olympic trials in Iowa City, Iowa.
snippet: Rulon Gardner’s effort to win a third Olympic medal in Greco-Roman wrestling at age 40 ended when he did not appear for a weigh-in at the Olympic trials in Iowa City, Iowa.
